description: Episode number 3 of Series "Economic Change in a Developing Country" Discusses the socio-economic features of Vabukori, a Mortu village near Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea. Traces the migration patterns of the Hula, shows type of community and economy resulting from employment in the town. Considers the future development of such a community.
